name: The Dream (Lokesh)
description:
Once before, dreamland was heaven, lived by different cultures of people. One day it was all hidden because the life tree started to dream. It makes everything invisible and turns it into mazes.  So, the soul of dreamland brings his all power together and makes life and gives his purpose of finding the magical stone hidden in the mazes to bring back the lost land.

Explore the dreamland filled with exciting mazes and find the magical stone to bring back the hidden mystery. 

Please support us by giving your feedback about the game experience in the comment section.
